document_data.name: Anabravvur's
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2023-01-12 - Shipbuilders of the Sea of Fallen Stars}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Anabravvur's''' was the best and most luxurious shipwright workshop in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], based in [[Selgaunt]] of [[Sembia]] in [[1490 DR|1490s DR]].
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Anabravvur's shipbuilders were run by [[Alpharra Anabravvur]], the third generation of her family to helm the business. Alpharra's ships were huge and luxurious, elegantly designed out of superb materials. Anabravvur's received a lot of business but could afford to spend time on building, unaffected financially by the loss of one or more clients.
